data.title: Charlie Sheen has been granted an emergency order that would give him sole physical and legal custody of his 14-year-old twin sons in the...
data.meta_description: 8,527 likes, 506 comments - entertainmenttonight on January 24, 2024: "Charlie Sheen has been granted an emergency order that would give him sole physical and legal custody of his 14-year-old twin sons in the event his ex-wife, Brooke Mueller, fails a drug test. According to court documents obtained by ET, Sheen and his ex-wife agreed to the modified custody deal in August 2023, after she allegedly ‚Äúrelapsed and engaged in abusing alcohol and controlled substances‚Äù in or about June and July 2023. Everything we know at the link in bio. (üì∏: Getty Images)".
